text: Vladimir S. "Jamir" Garcia (5 September 1978 – 26 November 2020) was a Filipino alternative metal singer-songwriter. He was the main vocalist of the metal band Slapshock. Garcia was born in Pampanga, Philippines. His career began in 1997. On 26 November 2020, Garcia was found dead at his home in Quezon City at the age of 42. The cause of death is believed to be suicide by hanging. ==Albums== *4th Degree Burn (PolyEast Records, 1999) *Headtrip (PolyEast Records, 2001) *Project 11-41 (PolyEast Records, 2002) *Novena (PolyEast Records, 2004) *Silence (PolyEast Records, 2006) *Cariño Brutal (PolyEast Records, 2010) *Kinse Kalibre (PolyEast Records, 2011) ==References== Category:1978 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Filipino singer-songwriters Category:Heavy metal singers Category:Suicides by hanging Category:People from Pampanga
title: Jamir Garcia
